newsitem.title: UK: Eve Group gets deals worth over 6.5 mln stg.
newsitem.headline: Eve Group gets deals worth over 6.5 mln stg.

text.p: British civil engineering firm Eve Group Plc said on Thursday its Eve Transmission unit had been awarded a series of power and telecommunications contracts worth over 6.5 million stg.
The largest deal, valued at over 5.0 million stg, was a refurbishment contract for British electricity network operator National Grid Group Plc.
Eve said it also secured several other contracts for transmission lines with various regional electricity companies.
